name: Cold Fog - Wonted Threat
description:
Welcome to Cold Fog - Wonted Threat, an expansion to Cold Fog!

A Threat has arrived home... your memories have been deceived and changed forever, keep your head up, and don't allow the demon to catch you!

Features:

  1.  AAA Quality Graphics
  2.  First-Person Horror Experience
  3.  The Most Mysterious Song Edit!
  4. A Real Challenge, Try to Outplay Your Enemy!

Credits are in-game!
